decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (TFL_001 Rev: C; Design and Access Statement Ref: 947; NE2017_0095B_SD_001 Rev: 00; NE2017_0144B_947_101 Rev: 00; NE2017_0095B_947_102 Rev: 00; NE2017_0095B_947_103 Rev: 01. Received: 17/11/2017; S9840 received 16/01/18) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The necessary road markings to designate the space for use by electric vehicles shall be in place prior to the commencement of the operational use of the hereby approved Electric Charging Point and its associated works, and shall be permanently maintained as such to ensure access for all electric vehicles.
Condition : 5 - The cabling extending from the charging point to the vehicle shall be retractable when not in use and permanently maintained in such a manner.

Condition : 6 - onsult with National Grid or their appointed contractors, to agree and submit to National Grid or their appointed contractors:
a)	A method statement
b)	Scheduled start dates
c)	Detailed construction proposals
In order to ensure the safe and integral operation of the mains gas networks within the vicinity of the site are not impacted by the proposed works either during construction or in their operation. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the submissions agreed with National Grid or their appointed contractors.
description: Installation of a Rapid Charging Point and associated works on the footpath and carriageway outside 3-4 Market Parade
